casebody.data:
Benton, Appellee, v. Cuyahoga Metropolitan Housing Authority et al., Appellants.

[Cite as Benton v. Cuyahoga Metro. Hous. Auth. (2001), 91 Ohio St.3d 206.]

(No. 00-1134 Submitted February 28, 2001 Decided March 28, 2001.) Willacy, LoPresti & Marcovy, Aubrey B. Willacy and Audrey H. Davis, for appellants.

The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed on the authority of Stevens v. Ackman (2001), 91 Ohio St.3d 182, 743 N.E.2d 901.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
